track.name: Candy
comments: Candy says she's made arrangements for me in the sand. Candy says she wants me with her down in Candyland.
Love this :)
Dana solo in the mid of a song is a true perfection
I love this song, and definatly rip Mark!  I wish I could have seen these cats live.
miss these guys so much it hurts...  RIP Mark
Notable, me vuelvo loco
Gimme more Morphine
cool
This track makes me feel bad, really really bad. [2]

Once upon a time I've read an interview with Ozzy Osbourne where he said about his dream to die on stage. It's very noble way of dying for a great artist but everytime I listen Morphine songs (like this beatiful Candy)I come to conclusion that Ozz had to be stoned or drunk during this bla bla interview. Mark Sandman was an Arist with unusual artistic ideas and I regret so much that he's dead.
What a song...
This song is ♥
amen to what has already been said below. this song is in a league of its own
Morphine is always great!
Enter Sandman... MARK SANDMAN. Great voice, great sound, great band.

for me, BEST-BAND-EVER. and that's just it. the best.
<3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3
I've kinda given up trying to put into words how much I love Morphine, so... ♥ ♥ ♥  will have to do!
This track makes me feel bad, really really bad. Amazing song. RIP, Mark..
klasse Lied
Quite probably my favourite Morphine number. If not, it's right up there. Top class sound, all of it.
